en._SHARED_PROMPT_MESSAGE_BackOfficeNewGame: 💁🏼‍♂️ Specify a title for the new game Your next text message will be used as the title for the new game.
en._SHARED_PROMPT_MESSAGE_BackOfficeNewRoun: 💁🏼‍♂️ Specify a title for the new round Your next text message will be used as the title for the new round.
en._SHARED_PROMPT_MESSAGE_BackOfficeNewSess: 💁🏼‍♂️ Specify a name for the new session Your next text message will be used as the name for the new session.
en._SHARED_PROMPT_MESSAGE_BackOfficeNewMail: 💁🏼‍♂️ Specify a name for the new mailing Your next text message will be used as the name for the new mailing.
💁🏼‍♂️ Specify text for the new mailing Your next text message will be used as the text for the new mailing.
en._SHARED_PROMPT_MESSAGE_GameServerAnswer_: 💁🏼‍♂️ First answer the question Your next text message will be accepted as an answer to the current question.
en._SHARED_PROMPT_CANCELLED_GameServerAnswe: 👌🏻 Question answer cancelled! And this is not normal. The system should not have allowed you to do this.
en._SHARED_PROMPT_MESSAGE_GameServerNewTeam: 💁🏼‍♂️ Specify a name for the new team Your next text message will be used as the name for the new team. A started question will automatically cancel the new team creation.
